_comment: LEVEL Pipeline Configuration - All values from configuration.json and pro Indian trading standards
_description: Bounce/rejection at key price levels (support, resistance, VWAP, premium/discount zones)

time_windows._comment: From configuration.json time_policy - NSE trading hours with opening bell for ICT setups

quality._comment: ALIGNED TO BASELINE: min_t1_rr: 1.2 from configuration.json

gates._comment: From configuration.json - min_volume_mult: 1.5 for support_bounce, order_block

trend_up._comment: REVERTED: counter_trend_size_mult 0.5→0.7 as 0.5 killed resistance_bounce_short (+2,569 Rs)

trend_down._comment: REVERTED: counter_trend_size_mult 0.5→0.7 to restore profitable level setups

setup_filters._comment: 3-YEAR OPTIMIZED FILTERS (Dec 2024): Analyzed 4,604 triggered trades, 732 trading days

orb_pullback_long._evidence: Keep existing - not enough trades for reanalysis

orb_pullback_short._evidence: Keep existing - not enough trades for reanalysis

support_bounce_long._evidence: 3YR VERIFIED: 95 trades, Rs 12,470 net (Rs 131 avg). Baseline 1,652 trades Rs -155,850 (-94 avg).
support_bounce_long._why_adx_15: ADX < 15 has 16.9% SL rate vs 30.9% for ADX >= 25. Low ADX = ranging market = support levels respected.
support_bounce_long._why_block_caps: Within ADX<15: large_cap Rs 9,860 net (+167 avg), small_cap Rs 3,048 (+90 avg), mid_cap Rs -5,490 (-172 avg), micro_cap Rs -743 (-68 avg)

range_bounce_long._evidence: 3YR: 118 trades, Rs -32,291 net (-274 avg). ALL regimes negative. Only micro_cap (10 trades) profitable. Not enough volume to salvage.

discount_zone_long._evidence: Keep existing - not enough trades for reanalysis

resistance_bounce_short._filter: micro/small_cap + rank>=1.4 + ADX>=20 + RSI<=70 + Hour>=11 + block trend_up
resistance_bounce_short._evidence: 3YR VERIFIED + OLD FILTERS. Hour>=11 + block trend_up adds +Rs 20,950 on top of existing filters.

range_bounce_short._evidence: 3YR: 1,113 trades Rs 285,838 (Rs 257 avg). Keep existing filters.

premium_zone_short._evidence: 3YR: 183 trades, Rs -31,436 net (-172 avg). Only Hour 10 (4 trades) and Hour 13 (35 trades) marginally positive. Not enough to justify.

order_block_short._evidence: Keep existing - profitable (Rs 425 avg on 13 trades)

global_filters._comment: Global filters that apply to all setups in this pipeline

short_min_adx._evidence: ADX < 15 = 0% WR. ADX 20-25 = 62% WR. Min 18 catches weak trends.

rsi_dead_zone._comment: Disabled for LEVEL - handled by setup-specific RSI filters

vwap_volume._comment: DATA-DRIVEN (Dec 2024): VWAP vol<50k: 18 trades (6W, 12L), blocking = +2,675 Rs improvement
vwap_volume._evidence: Low volume VWAP trades have poor execution and high slippage. Blocking vol<50k improves P&L by +2,675 Rs

specialized_filters._comment: Specialized filters that require complex logic (BB width). These are handled separately in pipeline code.

resistance_bounce_short_bb_width._evidence: Dec 2024 analysis: bb_width<=0.10 reduces hard_sl from 35%→28%

long_specific_filters._comment: DATA-DRIVEN (Dec 2024): Filters specific to long trades based on winner/loser analysis

rsi_max._evidence: RSI>=70: 9.3% WR (7W/75T). RSI<60: 16.4% WR (32W/195T). High RSI = chasing exhausted moves.

squeeze_regime_boost._evidence: 55.6% of winning longs came from squeeze regime vs only 20% from trend_up.

max_hold_minutes._evidence: Pro traders hold 30-90 min max. After 2 hours, momentum fades. Time-based exit if no T1 hit.

ranking._comment: LEVEL-SPECIFIC RANKING (Dec 2024) - Pro trader research: low ADX, extreme RSI, counter-VWAP acceptable for bounces
ranking._score_scale_note: Multiplier to scale weighted sum back to usable range (~0-5). Weighted sum alone produces ~0.17 mean.

volume._comment: REDUCED weight for level plays - structure matters more than volume

rsi._comment: INVERTED: Extreme RSI = GOOD for bounces (oversold for long, overbought for short)

adx._comment: INVERTED: Low ADX = GOOD for bounces (ranging market, levels respected)

vwap._comment: RELAXED: Counter-VWAP acceptable for reversal setups

distance._comment: KEEP HIGH WEIGHT: Near level = critical for bounce setups

squeeze._comment: Low squeeze = good for level plays (ranging, levels respected)

acceptance._comment: Quality bonus for LEVEL trades - excellent/good quality get ranking boost

strategy_regime_multipliers._comment: From baseline ranker.py _get_regime_multiplier() - Strategy-specific overrides for LEVEL setups

vwap_reclaim._comment: VWAP strategies similar to mean reversion - chop boost

premium_zone._comment: From baseline: chop=1.3, trend=0.9 - premium/discount zones work best in ranging

discount_zone._comment: From baseline: chop=1.3, trend=0.9 - premium/discount zones work best in ranging

order_block._comment: From baseline: trend=1.2, chop=1.1 - order blocks work in all conditions

entry._comment: WIDENED (Dec 2024): zone_mult_atr 0.3->0.5, min_zone_pct 0.25->0.30. Zero-trigger setups had 0.10-0.20% zones.

targets._comment: DATA-DRIVEN (Dec 2024): Setup-specific targets optimized via 1m backtest simulation

support_bounce_long._comment: OPTIMIZED Dec 2024: T1 1.0R + SL 0.9x. Tighter targets = 79% hit rate. +Rs 9.15L improvement over 3yr

resistance_bounce_short._comment: OPTIMIZED Dec 2024: T1 3.0R + SL 1.5x. Wider targets = let winners run. +Rs 5.12L improvement over 3yr

range_bounce_short._comment: OPTIMIZED Dec 2024: T1 3.0R + SL 1.5x. Wider targets = let winners run. +Rs 4.83L improvement over 3yr

long._comment: Default for other long setups: T1 1.0R (tighter targets work better for longs)

short._comment: Default for other short setups: T1 1.5R

qty_splits._comment: 60-40 split to match OLD config - T3 disabled (0%)

caps._comment: FIXED: max_pct was 1.0 (1%) - way too restrictive! Old config uses 100%. Targets need to reach 2-3R for positive expectancy.

stop_loss._comment: DATA-DRIVEN (Dec 2024): Setup-specific SL optimized via 1m backtest simulation

support_bounce_long._comment: OPTIMIZED Dec 2024: 0.9x tighter SL (2.0→1.8 ATR). Tighter SL + T1 1.0R = +Rs 9.15L over 3yr

resistance_bounce_short._comment: OPTIMIZED Dec 2024: 1.5x wider SL (2.0→3.0 ATR). More room + T1 3.0R = +Rs 5.12L over 3yr

range_bounce_short._comment: OPTIMIZED Dec 2024: 1.5x wider SL (2.0→3.0 ATR). More room + T1 3.0R = +Rs 4.83L over 3yr

rsi_penalty._comment: LEVEL: Penalize extreme RSI (price may overshoot level)
